hints.0: Per la maggior parte delle fattorie, maggior grandezza significa più produzione. I raccoglitori di bacche sono un'eccezione alla regola.
hints.1: Con l'aumentare del numero di coloni, aumenteranno il numero e la tipologia di mostri.
hints.10: 3x33 è la misura ottimale per un boscaiolo.
hints.16: _MISSING_Use the compass to find your way towards different colonies and outposts.
hints.17: _MISSING_Use the astrolabe to find the different regions with unique resources.
hints.18: _MISSING_Build the Sacred Failsafe and spend Sacred Points to save your colony when it is getting overrun by monster
hints.19: _MISSING_Place the Sacred Storage to store more Sacred Points
hints.2: Certi strati del mondo contengono minerali. Scava più in profondità per trovarne di diversi.
hints.20: _MISSING_Use blue, green, red and white paint to colour items like doors and windows
hints.21: _MISSING_Use paint stripper to remove the colours you've added to items.
hints.22: _MISSING_Elevators can't be used by colonists, but they are a quick way of moving up and down for players.
hints.23: _MISSING_Build rails and rail stations to quickly move from A to B.
hints.24: _MISSING_Use rail gates to make an impenetrable barrier for monsters, without stopping rail carts
hints.25: _MISSING_Place the statistics board to get detailed information on your colony.
hints.26: _MISSING_Place the Archimedean Screw to remove all nearby water.
hints.27: _MISSING_We write a periodic Friday Blog. Find it on steam to learn more about the development of Colony Survival!
hints.28: _MISSING_There are mods for Colony Survival. Find them on the Steam Forums or Discord!
hints.4: Clicca sui 'blocchi da lavoro' per vedere cosa fanno ed impostare le priorità agli oggetti da produrre.
hints.7: Diversità di portata, velocità di ricarica e danno forniscono ad ogni tipo di guardia benefici e svantaggi unici.

bannerclickedpopup.deletecolonydescription: Eliminando l'ultimo stendardo di una colonia tutti gli NPC verranno rimossi e la colonia sarà inutilizzabile. Se sei sicuro di eliminare, digita 'delete' qui sotto.
bannerclickedpopup.noconfirmationdelete: Comando di eliminazione ignorato, la conferma non è stata data
bannerclickedpopup.placementfail: Impossibile posizionare lo stendardo in questo punto

bannerplacementpopup.mustbeleader: _MISSING_Must be the colony leader to adjust banners

chat.colonydied: Tutti i coloni di {0} sono stati uccisi.

managejobs.header_text: _MISSING_{0} Laborers without a job. Enabled jobs: {1} / {2}. Filled jobs: {3} / {1}

outpost.createdescription: _MISSING_Starting an outpost consumes an Outpost Banner from your inventory (or stockpile).

colonymanagement.recruitauto: Auto-reclutamento al posizionamento di un nuovo lavoro
colonymanagement.recruitfailedbeds: _MISSING_<color=#ff2323>Couldn't recruit a new colonist - not enough free beds.</color>
colonymanagement.recruitfailedcap: _MISSING_<color=#ff2323>Couldn't recruit a new colonist - reached capacity.</color>
colonymanagement.recruitfailednomeals: _MISSING_<color=#ff2323>Couldn't recruit a new colonist - not enough meals in stockpile.</color>
colonymanagement.recruittext3: I coloni necessitano di 2000 calorie al giorno e un letto.
colonymanagement.recruittext5-2: _MISSING_There are {0} spare beds and you can recruit {1} more colonists before reaching max population.
colonymanagement.recruittofillbeds: Recluta per occupare tutti i letti
colonymanagement.recruittofilljobs: Recluta per occupare tutti i lavori

science.incomingdescription2: _MISSING_They will share their science with you
science.selectcolony: Seleziona una colonia con cui condividere la scienza

start.defaultkit: Prima volta che viene usato lo Starter Kit
start.missingkit: Starter Kit per la colonia mancante
start.name: Nome Colonia

trading.ruleincomingdescr2: _MISSING_Get {0} if they have more than {1} and we have less than {2}.
trading.rulemaximumtraded: _MISSING_This deal will send up to the following amount of items in total:
trading.ruleoutgoingdescr2: _MISSING_Send {0} if we have more than {1} and they have less than {2}.
trading.selectcolony: Seleziona una colonia con cui commerciare

commands.nopermission: _MISSING_You do not have the permission '{0}' to do that.

stages.local2: _MISSING_Searching for online server on this computer

failsafe.damage: _MISSING_Triggering the Sacred Failsafe will cause {0} damage
failsafe.futurewave: _MISSING_The Failsafe will reduce the total HP of incoming monsters by {0:P0} for the next night
failsafe.nextavailable: _MISSING_The Failsafe will be available again after the next night
failsafe.wave: _MISSING_The current threat level is {0} and will spawn monsters with a total HP of {1}
failsafe.wavereduced: _MISSING_The total HP of incoming monsters will be reduced by {0:P0} the next night

general.gamepadtextinputalphanumeric: _MISSING_Only alphabet letters and numbers are accepted.

npc_died.individual: _MISSING_{0}: A colonist with job {1} died from: {2}

alarmbell.description: _MISSING_Unlocks the Alarm Bell, which will ring a bell when walked upon by a monster
alarmbell.name: _MISSING_Alarm Bell

anvil.description: _MISSING_Unlocks the Anvil, an important source of more advanced products like Copper Tools
anvil.name: _MISSING_Anvil

archery.description: _MISSING_Unlocks archers and fletchers, a more effective protection against monsters.
archery.name: _MISSING_Archery

artist.description: _MISSING_Unlocks a new job that is completely dedicated to aesthetics
artist.name: _MISSING_Artist

astrolabe.description: _MISSING_Unlocks the astrolabe; a navigation tool that helps find biomes
astrolabe.name: _MISSING_Astrolabe

blastfurnace.description: _MISSING_Unlocks a rapid way to smelt advanced metals.
blastfurnace.name: _MISSING_Blast Furnace

brass.description: _MISSING_Unlocks brass, a relatively soft alloy. It’s not suited for weapons or tools, but its malleability makes it perfect for small detailed parts. It requires zinc, which can be purchased or mined below mammoth trees.
brass.name: _MISSING_Brass

bread.description: _MISSING_Unlocks the making of bread. Use grindstones to make flour, which can then be used by the cook to make bread.
bread.name: _MISSING_Bread

bricks.description: _MISSING_Allows baking clay into new types of blocks
bricks.name: _MISSING_Bricks

bronze.description: _MISSING_Unlocks a way to make copper stronger, by mixing it with the rare and valuable tin
bronze.name: _MISSING_Bronze Age

bronzelockbox.description: _MISSING_Unlocks the Bronze Lockbox. Improved version of the Copper Lockbox. More storage, more efficiency, less threatening.
bronzelockbox.name: _MISSING_Bronze Lockbox

caltrop.description: _MISSING_Unlocks a trap that once loaded will slow monsters below it
caltrop.name: _MISSING_Caltrops

chestluxury.description: _MISSING_Unlocks Luxury Chests, which are necessary to unlock advanced technology.
chestluxury.name: _MISSING_Luxury Chest

chestprestige.description: _MISSING_Abandon all hope of reward and proportion, ye who enter here! Prestige Chests are necessary for Prestige Science. It’s a stretch goal for enthusiastic colonies.
chestprestige.name: _MISSING_Prestige Chest

chestresource.description: _MISSING_Unlocks Science Chests, which are necessary to unlock advanced technology
chestresource.name: _MISSING_Science Chest

chickenmeal.description: _MISSING_Unlocks a more complex meal which yields more Sacred Points when consumed by colonists
chickenmeal.name: _MISSING_Chicken Meals

compass.description: _MISSING_Unlocks the compass; a navigation tool to find back your home
compass.name: _MISSING_Compass

constructionbuilder.description: _MISSING_Unlock builder areas for the construction worker
constructionbuilder.name: _MISSING_Builder

constructiondigger.description: _MISSING_Unlock digger areas for the construction worker
constructiondigger.name: _MISSING_Digger

cook.description: _MISSING_Unlocks the cook and the fisherman, new sources of meals for your colonists
cook.name: _MISSING_Cook

copperlockbox.description: _MISSING_Unlocks the Copper Lockbox. While placed it increases the colony point capacity. Warning: every placed lockbox will lure more monsters to your colony!
copperlockbox.name: _MISSING_Copper Lockbox

cotton.description: _MISSING_Unlocks a source of high quality textiles. Cotton plants only grow in heaths.
cotton.name: _MISSING_Cotton

dyeing.description: _MISSING_Learn to grow flowers in marshes, allowing you to add color to your world.
dyeing.name: _MISSING_Dyeing

elevator.description: _MISSING_Unlocks elevator production, useful for traversing vertical distances
elevator.name: _MISSING_Elevator

elevatorhorizontal.description: _MISSING_Unlocks rail production, useful for traversing horizontal distances
elevatorhorizontal.name: _MISSING_Rails

engineer.description: _MISSING_Unlocks the engineer and the trapfixer. The engineer makes traps and their ammo, which can be used to fight monsters. The trapfixer will load and reload nearby traps.
engineer.name: _MISSING_Engineer

failsafe.description: _MISSING_Unlocks the Sacred Failsafe, an emergency tool that uses Sacred Points to eliminate monsters
failsafe.name: _MISSING_Sacred Failsafe

farming.description: _MISSING_Unlocks the wheat farmer. Wheat will grow in importance as food over time.
farming.name: _MISSING_Wheat Farming

fence.description: _MISSING_Could be very practical, but is mostly aesthetic.
fence.name: _MISSING_Fence

furnace.description: _MISSING_Unlocks the smelter, a worker who processes ores
furnace.name: _MISSING_Smelter

glider.description: _MISSING_Unlocks glider production, allowing unpowered flight from higher points
glider.name: _MISSING_Glider

glidersteel.description: _MISSING_Unlocks a launcher that quickly shoots gliders to tremendous heights.
glidersteel.name: _MISSING_Launched Steel Glider

goldenstatue.description: _MISSING_Unlocks the Threat Banner, which will attract monsters from other outposts to the one it's placed in.
goldenstatue.name: _MISSING_Threat Banner

grassdirt.description: _MISSING_Provides a source for grass and dirt
grassdirt.name: _MISSING_Grass & Dirt Production

grenadelauncher.description: _MISSING_Unlocks a powerful weapon which can eliminate groups of enemies at a distance.
grenadelauncher.name: _MISSING_Grenade Launcher

guntrap.description: _MISSING_Unlocks a powerful trap which does enormous amounts of damage.
guntrap.name: _MISSING_Cannon Trap

hemp.description: _MISSING_Unlocks the cultivation of hemp plants in marshes as well as purchasing it. Leads towards processing it into ropes and paper.
hemp.name: _MISSING_Hemp

iron.description: _MISSING_A major step forward for your colony, unlocking a new material which is required in many items
iron.name: _MISSING_Iron Age

jewellery.description: _MISSING_Unlocks the Jeweler, who creates delicate things
jewellery.name: _MISSING_Jeweler

jewelry.description: _MISSING_Unlocks jewelry, a good product for trade
jewelry.name: _MISSING_Jewelry

lanterns.description: _MISSING_Unlocks lanterns, useful for lighting up places
lanterns.name: _MISSING_Lanterns

lathe.description: _MISSING_Unlocks a complex machine which allows colonists to rapidly make detailed metal parts.
lathe.name: _MISSING_Metal Lathe

miner.description: _MISSING_Unlocks the miner. When placed on a dark stone block, a colonist will come to mine that material continuously.
miner.name: _MISSING_Miner

monocular.description: _MISSING_Unlocks a nifty tool which can be used to observe things in the distance
monocular.name: _MISSING_Monocular

mudbricks.description: _MISSING_Unlocks mudbricks, a cheap and simple building material
mudbricks.name: _MISSING_Mudbricks

musket.description: _MISSING_Unlocks a new gunpowder weapon. Does less damage than a handcannon but the ammo is cheaper, it has a larger range and it’s quicker to reload.
musket.name: _MISSING_Musket

nitro.description: _MISSING_Unlocks a highly explosive compound essential for smokeless powder. It’s a lot less messy than traditional gunpowder, allowing for the development of more sophisticated firearms with many moving parts.
nitro.name: _MISSING_Nitrocellulose

npcshop.description: _MISSING_Unlocks the Grocery Shop, a place where colonists can receive their daily meals. If none are found, they'll visit the banner.
npcshop.name: _MISSING_Grocery Shop

outposts.description: _MISSING_Unlocks Outpost Banners. They can be placed to expand the colony, both close and further away.
outposts.name: _MISSING_Outposts

papermaking.description: _MISSING_Unlocks making paper from hemp, a key part towards scientific progress
papermaking.name: _MISSING_Paper Production

poison.description: _MISSING_Unlocks poison processing, useful for inflicting damage to monsters over time. Wisteria plants can only be grown in heaths. Each wisteria harvester needs 10 wisteria plants nearby to function well.
poison.name: _MISSING_Poison

porridge.description: _MISSING_Unlocks combining water and wheat into a new meal type
porridge.name: _MISSING_Porridge

pottery.description: _MISSING_Unlocks pottery, used to carry things around, and earthenware that can be sold
pottery.name: _MISSING_Pottery

prestige1.description: _MISSING_A goal to organize and measure the best of our energies and skills!
prestige1.name: _MISSING_Prestige I

prestige2.description: _MISSING_It’s not the destination that matters: it’s the journey.
prestige2.name: _MISSING_Prestige II

prestige3.description: _MISSING_This place is a place of honor. A highly esteemed deed is commemorated here.
prestige3.name: _MISSING_Prestige III

prestige5.description: _MISSING_Congratulations! You successfully completed all stretch goals.
prestige5.name: _MISSING_Prestige V

printingpress.description: _MISSING_Unlocks the printing press, a complex machine that allows you to scale up the production of Books of Knowledge. Also unlocks brass precision parts, which are required for a lot of other machines.
printingpress.name: _MISSING_Printing Press

projectiletrap.description: _MISSING_Unlocks a trap that once loaded will shoot sideways at strong monsters
projectiletrap.name: _MISSING_Projectile Trap

recursiveknowledge.description: _MISSING_Helps make books by using books so you can make more books
recursiveknowledge.name: _MISSING_Recursive Self-Improvement

researcher.description: _MISSING_Unlocks the researcher, who will do research using nearby bookcases to progress science
researcher.name: _MISSING_Researcher

roofs.description: _MISSING_An attractive way to cover your buildings
roofs.name: _MISSING_Tiled Roofs

ropetrap.description: _MISSING_Unlocks a trap that freezes nearby monsters for 10 seconds when one monster passes over it.
ropetrap.name: _MISSING_Rope Trap

sacredhouse.description: _MISSING_Unlocks the Sacred Point Storage, to extend the amount of Sacred Points which can be used by the Failsafe
sacredhouse.name: _MISSING_Sacred Point Storage

scribe.description: _MISSING_Unlocks the scribe, who studies scrolls to gain new insights. A scribe requires 10 Scrolls Shelves nearby. The scribe empties them, but they automatically fill themselves up again over time.
scribe.name: _MISSING_Scribe

signs.description: _MISSING_Time to put your name on things
signs.name: _MISSING_Signs

statistics.description: _MISSING_Unlocks the Statistics Board. When placed and used, it gives insights into the activity of your colony.
statistics.name: _MISSING_Statistics Board

steel.description: _MISSING_Unlocks steel, lead and mineral oil. These resources are necessary for the construction of more modern machinery. Lead ore is found in marshes, and coal is located below mammoth trees.
steel.name: _MISSING_Steel, Lead and Mineral Oil

steeltools.description: _MISSING_Unlocks a more durable tool which allows colonists to do their work more efficiently.
steeltools.name: _MISSING_Steel Tools

stonemason.description: _MISSING_Unlocks the stonemason, useful for adding variety to buildings
stonemason.name: _MISSING_Stonemason

tabulator.description: _MISSING_Unlocks a complex machine which processes data and stores it in punched-cards.
tabulator.name: _MISSING_Tabulating Machine

tailoring.description: _MISSING_Unlocks the tailor, a worker who can turn flax into linen and other items. Linen is a good source of colony points
tailoring.name: _MISSING_Tailor

tanner.description: _MISSING_Unlocks the tanner, a worker who is vital in the production of leather and, later, parchment
tanner.name: _MISSING_Tanner

toolshop.description: _MISSING_Unlocks the Tool Distribution Table, a place where colonists will go to take tools when used. If none are found, they'll go to the banner.
toolshop.name: _MISSING_Tool Distribution

trader.description: _MISSING_Used to accelerate trade deals between colonies. Not used for trading with outposts; intended for multiplayer.
trader.name: _MISSING_Trader

trading.description: _MISSING_Unlocks the Merchant's Hub, a place where you can buy and sell items
trading.name: _MISSING_Merchant's Hub

waterpump.description: _MISSING_Allows gathering water away from water sources
waterpump.name: _MISSING_Water pumping

watersponge.description: _MISSING_Removes water in its local area in a deeply realistic way
watersponge.name: _MISSING_Archimedean Screw

writer.description: _MISSING_Unlocks the writer, parchment and scrolls of knowledge. These are important to complete more advanced science.
writer.name: _MISSING_Writer

inventory.madeintooltippurchasable: _MISSING_Purchasable at the Merchant Hub for {0} points

itemselector.description: Seleziona il tipo di oggetto da usare

limits.description: I coloni lavoreranno fino a raggiungere la quantità fissata nel magazzino.
limits.group2: _MISSING_Select one of multiple groups for this specific worker. Adjusting limits will adjust them for all workers of this type with the same group.

hoverpriority.b:
Gli oggetti con priorità +++ vengono prodotti prima.
Quelli con priorità + alla fine.

limits.wrongcolony: _MISSING_Selected crafting job is part of another colony

specialblockremoval.description: Rimuovere questo blocco di tipo {0} potrebbe causare problematiche per la colonia. Cosa vuoi fare?

toolconstruction.description: Selezionare il tipo di area che si desidera creare.
toolconstruction.shapemenudescription: _MISSING_Select the shape to use for the next areas

tooljob.berrya: Cibo semplice e veloce, inizia da questo!
tooljob.builderb: Apri il menu per scegliere il tipo, poi seleziona un'area da riempire
tooljob.builderreplacerb: _MISSING_Select an area in which to replace one type of block with another
tooljob.construction1: Lascia fare a loro il lavoro
tooljob.construction2: Aprirà un altro menu dove potrai scegliere il tipo di costruzione
tooljob.description: Selezionare il tipo di area che si desidera creare.
tooljob.diggerspeciala: Rimuove un tipo specifico dall'area di scavo
tooljob.dyer1: _MISSING_Add colors to make life a little less drab
tooljob.dyer2: _MISSING_This will open another menu with multiple farm jobs
tooljob.foresterb: Ha bisogno di un'ascia e di un terreno coltivabile
tooljob.wateradjacent: Necessità di acqua adiacente al luogo di lavoro

toolshop.description: _MISSING_Adjust the minimum required stockpile levels before colonists use specific tools. Allows them to be used for crafting or science.

page1_2.text1_2: _MISSING_Start by finding a good spot for your first colony. Having water and flat fields for farming nearby is recommended. A Banner will be the center of your colony.
page1_2.text2_2gamepad: _MISSING_Select the Banner Tool in the inventory below using <style=Player/HotBarUp> and <style=Player/HotBarDown>. Place it with <style=Player/FireSecondary> while aiming at the ground with the Banner Tool selected. Once in a Colony, the Banner Tool displays a deep shadow wherever monsters may spawn later.
page1_2.text2_2keyboard: _MISSING_Select the Banner Tool in the inventory below using <style=Player/Inventory1>. Place it with <style=Player/FireSecondary> while aiming at the ground with the Banner Tool selected. Once in a Colony, the Banner Tool displays a deep shadow wherever monsters may spawn later.
page1_2.text3_2: _MISSING_Place beds to be able to recruit colonists. Press <style=Player/ToggleInventory> to open the interface. Move beds from the stockpile to the hotbar below. With the bed selected, use <style=Player/FireSecondary> while aiming at ground to place a bed.
page1_2.text4: _MISSING_Open the interface and go to the 'Colony' page. Press 'recruit' to recruit a colonist.

page2_2.description: _MISSING_These are essential for growth and survival
page2_2.text1: _MISSING_Colonists require 1 meal per day. They grab these at the banner or a nearby grocery store. Without food, colonists starve. Recruiting new colonists costs multiple meals.
page2_2.text2_2gamepad: _MISSING_The berry farmer is the first food source. Select the Command Tool (the first inventory slot). <style=Player/FirePrimary> to open it and select the berry farmer. <style=Player/FireSecondary> to start defining the berry farm, then <style=Player/FireSecondary> again elsewhere to finish. You’ll need quite a lot of these!
page2_2.text2_2keyboard: _MISSING_The berry farmer is the first food source. Select the Command Tool (<style=Player/Inventory0>). <style=Player/FirePrimary> to open it and select the berry farmer. <style=Player/FireSecondary> to start defining the berry farm, then <style=Player/FireSecondary> again elsewhere to finish. You’ll need quite a lot of these!
page2_2.text3_2: _MISSING_To start producing beds, you’ll have to craft a tinkerer’s table. Holding <style=Player/FirePrimary> while aiming at blocks will allow you to dig down to gather the required stone rubble.
page2_2.text4: _MISSING_Click on the tinkerer’s table icon on the left of the stockpile to craft it. Place it like you placed the bed. Like with the berry farm, unemployed colonists will automatically take this job.

page3_2.text1: _MISSING_Workers will go to crates both to gather ingredients from the stockpile and to deliver crafted products to the stockpile. If there aren't any crates yet, the banner will function as one.
page3_2.text2: _MISSING_A lot of jobs can or must use tools. Different tools have different costs, durabilities and production speed bonuses. The tinkerer automatically produces stone tools.
page3_2.text3: _MISSING_Use science to unlock new jobs, items and features. Open the science page in the interface to check the requirements and unlock new technology when it becomes available.
page3_2.text4: _MISSING_When you’ve unlocked the Miner science, the tinkerer will produce “miner jobs”. Dig down and place these on dark stone blocks or ores to have colonists mine them sustainably.

page4_2.description: _MISSING_Defend your colony against the monsters of the night!
page4_2.text1: _MISSING_Unlocking some science will add 'threat'. This is shown in the top-right of the UI. Recruiting extra colonists will add threat at a slow pace after the first 25. As the threat level rises, more and stronger monsters will appear.
page4_2.text2: _MISSING_Build walls and dig moats in the monster-free zone to protect the center of your colony. Feel free to place jobs like farms in the “monster zone” outside of this: colonists will leave this area and go to their beds when the night starts.
page4_2.text3: _MISSING_Your tinkerer will produce the item 'Night Slinger Guard'. Place this in your colony to recruit a slinger who works during the night.
page4_2.text4: _MISSING_Progress in the tech tree to unlock new guards, traps and the Sacred Failsafe.

page5_2.description: _MISSING_Trade and expand to get access to unique resources
page5_2.text1_2: _MISSING_Unlock and place the Merchant’s Hub. Use <style=Player/FireSecondary> to open its interface. Sell items to earn Colony Points. Among others, points can be spent on upgrades like the colonist limit in the Colony Points page.
page5_2.text2: _MISSING_This world contains multiple regions with unique resources. There are mountaintops covered with snow, heaths covered in purple, marshes and mammoth trees. Unlock and equip the astrolabe to find them easily.
page5_2.text3: _MISSING_Unlock outposts, purchase an Outpost Banner and carry it with you while you explore. Place it to start an Outpost. Its stockpile and scientific progress are shared with the main colony and other outposts. Build outposts in the regions mentioned above to get access to their resources.

page6_2.text1: _MISSING_For some jobs, you have to place both the 'harvester' and the 'source' block. Most of the time each harvester block needs about 10 source blocks.
page6_2.text2: _MISSING_A harvester block like the Scribe's Desk recruits a colonist to work there. That colonist will try to visit a nearby source block, in this case a filled Scroll Shelf, before crafting.
page6_2.text3: _MISSING_Harvesters empty their source blocks, but source blocks automatically regenerate over time. The 1 to 10 ratio ensures a sustainable long term balance.

languagemenu.coverage: Questa lingua è per il {0:F1}% completa. Per aiutare a completarla, consulta il forum o il repository su GitHub
languagemenu.wiptext: Lavori in corso. Questa traduzione potrebbe non essere totalmente tradotta e alcune traduzioni possono risultare meno complete o più complete di questa.

videomenu.restarttoapply: (*) è necessario riavviare il gioco per applicare la modifica

singleplayermenu.confirmdeletedescription:
Stai per eliminare la cartella contenente questo mondo.
Sei sicuro?
singleplayermenu.legacyworldhint: _MISSING_You've selected a legacy world. To load this you'll need to run an older version of Colony Survival. You can set Steam to download old versions by going into the games' properties and selecting an older version in the beta's tab there.

modschanged.disabled: _MISSING_'{0}' is disabled or missing but previously used.
modschanged.main:
_MISSING_Loading world '{0}' but some mods changed.
This may cause problems.

tooltip.craftingblock: _MISSING_Orders a colonist to work here as a {0}
tooltip.crate: _MISSING_Colonists will move to one of these blocks to get or deposit items every so often
tooltip.guard-general: _MISSING_Orders a colonist to guard this position
tooltip.is-edible: _MISSING_Meal item, colonists will eat one meal every day
tooltip.is-sanctified: _MISSING_Receive {0} sacred points when colonists eat this meal
tooltip.miner: _MISSING_Orders a colonist to repeatedly mine the dark stone ore block underneath
tooltip.npcshop: _MISSING_Colonists will visit this or the banner to get their daily meal
tooltip.pointtrader: _MISSING_You can buy and sell things for points here
tooltip.requires-water: _MISSING_Must be placed next to water to function
tooltip.statisticsboard: _MISSING_Interact with this block to view statistics of your colony
tooltip.threatstatue-general: _MISSING_Pulls threat from other outposts towards the outpost it's placed in, while also causing some threat itself
tooltip.tool-general: _MISSING_Tools are used by many jobs to accelerate crafting
tooltip.toolshop: _MISSING_Colonists will visit this or the banner to get new tools when needed
tooltip.trap-explosive-range: _MISSING_Affects an area with radius {0} on hit
tooltip.trap-filter-1000hp: _MISSING_Only triggers on monsters with at least 1000 hp
tooltip.trap-filter-unslowed: _MISSING_Only triggers on monsters not yet slowed
tooltip.trapfixer: _MISSING_Orders a colonist to restock nearby traps during the day
tooltip.trap-general: _MISSING_Trap item, awaits monsters to pass along and triggers. They will be refilled during the day by Trapfixer colonists

typeuses.alarmbell: _MISSING_Rings an alarm when it detects monsters walking over it
typeuses.alkanet: Nella realtà, è un colorante per tinture rosse
typeuses.astrolabe: _MISSING_Equip in the hotbar to see the way to special biomes
typeuses.berry: _MISSING_A single berry. Not worth the effort of eating it!
typeuses.berrybush: I coloni li possono piantare per avere cibo facilmente
typeuses.berrymeal: _MISSING_A bunch of berries prepared to form a delicious meal
typeuses.bookcase: _MISSING_These are 'harvested' by researchers and automatically regenerate their content. Placing 10 of them for every researcher ensures a long term balance.
typeuses.bookcase1: _MISSING_These are 'harvested' by researchers and automatically regenerate their content. Placing 10 of them for every researcher ensures a long term balance.
typeuses.bookcase2: _MISSING_These are 'harvested' by researchers and automatically regenerate their content. Placing 10 of them for every researcher ensures a long term balance.
typeuses.bookcasefilled: _MISSING_These are 'harvested' by researchers and automatically regenerate their content. Placing 10 of them for every researcher ensures a long term balance.
typeuses.bow: Gli arcieri ne hanno bisogno di uno!
typeuses.bread: _MISSING_A dry piece of bread without any spread or filling. Bleh
typeuses.breadmeal: _MISSING_Bread made tasty with a perfect berry jam
typeuses.bricks: Dopo tutto è un gioco Olandese
typeuses.cherryblossom: La cosa più rosa del gioco
typeuses.compass: _MISSING_Equip in the hotbar to see the way to colonies and outposts
typeuses.cookedfish: Le capacità di nuotare si riducono drammaticamente
typeuses.coppertools: Nemmeno il pane puoi tagliare senza utensili
typeuses.crossbowbolt: Più duro, più forte, più veloce
typeuses.furnace: Utilizza la legna da ardere come combustibile per produrre lingotti di bronzo e mattoni
typeuses.glider: _MISSING_Places a glider launcher; Enter one using <style=Player/FireSecondary> and navigate by aiming while holding forward
typeuses.glidersteel: _MISSING_Like the regular glider launcher, but this one launches you much higher into the air
typeuses.goldingot: Una volta usato per garantire il valore delle banconote
typeuses.goldore: _MISSING_Can also be found in ore beneath snowy mountains
typeuses.hollyhock: Nella realtà è un lasstivo. Non nel gioco. Ancora.
typeuses.ironore: Estratto con un piccone di ferro, che è fatto con il minerale di ferro
typeuses.leavestemperate: Prova a saltarci dentro da una torre alta
typeuses.monocular: _MISSING_Equip in the hotbar to take a closer look at the world
typeuses.npcshop: I coloni lo visitano giornalmente per avere cibo e oggetti per la propria felicità
typeuses.planks: Ora 4 volte la dimensione di un tronco
typeuses.railgate: _MISSING_Allows rail travel while blocking travel by foot
typeuses.researcherdesk: _MISSING_Researches require bookcases nearby in order to find data for their research!
typeuses.sand: Non si mescola bene con i serpenti
typeuses.scribedesk: _MISSING_Scribes requires 10 scroll shelves nearby in order to find data for their research!
typeuses.scrollshelf: _MISSING_These are 'harvested' by scribes and automatically regenerate their content. Placing 10 of them for every scribe ensures a long term balance.
typeuses.scrollshelf1: _MISSING_These are 'harvested' by scribes and automatically regenerate their content. Placing 10 of them for every scribe ensures a long term balance.
typeuses.scrollshelf2: _MISSING_These are 'harvested' by scribes and automatically regenerate their content. Placing 10 of them for every scribe ensures a long term balance.
typeuses.scrollshelffilled: _MISSING_These are 'harvested' by scribes and automatically regenerate their content. Placing 10 of them for every scribe ensures a long term balance.
typeuses.silicasand: _MISSING_Found below sand in the Heath biome
typeuses.splittingstump: Un modo veloce per rendere i tronchi della legna da ardere
typeuses.stove: Utilizzato per riempire l'aria circostante con un gradevole profumo
typeuses.sulfur: _MISSING_Found deep underground in the Heath biome
typeuses.tin: _MISSING_Can also be found in ore beneath snowy mountains
typeuses.waterpump: _MISSING_Allows getting water without being near water
typeuses.watersponge: _MISSING_Removes water in its local area in a deeply realistic way
typeuses.wheat: Un colono con una macina lo trasformerà in farina
typeuses.wisteriajob: _MISSING_One harvester needs 10 wisteria plants nearby. These plants can only be grown in heaths.
typeuses.wisteriaplant: _MISSING_Placing 10 of these for every wisteria harvester ensures a long term balance.
typeuses.wisteriaplantempty: _MISSING_Placing 10 of these for every wisteria harvester ensures a long term balance.
typeuses.wolfsbane: Una dozzina di specie ne crescono in Italia
typeuses.zinc: _MISSING_Can be found directly below mammoth trees.
